thread.title: Grayslake library used book sale
thread.title_full: Grayslake library used book sale - DailyHerald.com

author: Daily Herald report
title: Grayslake library used book sale
text:
Friends of the Grayslake Library hosts its fall used book sale Oct. 23 through Oct. 25 at the Grayslake Area Public Library, 100 Library Lane, Grayslake. Hours are: Friday, Oct. 23, 9:30 a.m. -- 5 p.m.; Saturday, Oct. 24, 9:30 a.m. -- 4 p.m.; Sunday, Oct. 25, -- bag sale 1 -- 4 p.m. $5 a bag sale all day. Book Sales are held twice a year and in addition to raising funds, provide the public with the opportunity to purchase quality books at a very low cost. All proceeds support library programs and events such as Summer & Winter Concert Series, Friday Night Film Series, and LEGO Robotics. For information, contact friends@grayslake.info or call (847) 223-5313. For information about the library and programs visit www.grayslake.info .
 News Charities and Fundraising Grayslake Public Library
